          <title>
            <string language="en">Non-renewable energy resources  oil and gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nicht erneuerbare Energiebetriebsmittel Öl und 
Gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources énergétiques non-renouvelables 
pétrole et gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos de energia non-renewable óleo e gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse energetiche non rinnovabili petrolio e

            <string language="x-mt-el">Μη ανανεώσιμο πετρέλαιο των ενεργειακών στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς και αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos energéticos no renovables aceite y gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the extraction of oil and gas from the remains of microscopic sea organisms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Extraktion des Öls und
des Gases vom Remains der mikroskopischen Seeorganismen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'extraction de pétrole
et de gaz des restes des organizations microscopiques de mer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a extração do óleo e 
do gás do remains de organismos microscópicos do mar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'estrazione di 
petrolio e di gas dal remains degli organismi microscopici del mare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξαγωγή του 
πετρελαίου και αέριο από τα υπολείμματα των μικροσκοπικών 
οργανισμών θάλασσας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la extracción del 
aceite y del gas del restos de los organismos microscópicos del mar.</string>
